definition: a diplomatic note/letter of understanding or concern exchanged between governments

sentences.english: The Chinese side also presented an official note on the matter to the U.S. side.
sentences.chinese: 中方还就此向美方递交了正式照会。

sentences.english: The Chinese government also sent a note to the British government, reiterating its position.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府同时将此立场照会英国政府。

sentences.english: Formal Note is essentially a formal personal letter.
sentences.chinese: 正式照会实质上是正式的个人函件。
